eventDecorators.name: Sponsored
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when asset tokens are supplied to sponsor the yield source.

functionDecorators.name: balanceOfToken
functionDecorators.description: Returns the total balance (in asset tokens). This includes the deposits and interest.

returnDecorators.name: mAssets
returnDecorators.description: The underlying balance of mAsset tokens. eg mUSD.

functionDecorators.name: depositToken
functionDecorators.description: Returns the ERC20 mAsset token used for deposits.

returnDecorators.name: underlyingMasset
returnDecorators.description: Underlying mAsset token address. eg mUSD.

functionDecorators.name: imBalances
functionDecorators.description: mapping of account addresses to interest-bearing mAsset balances. eg imUSD.

functionDecorators.name: redeemToken
functionDecorators.description: Redeems mAsset tokens from the interest-beaing mAsset. eg. redeems mUSD from imUSD.

parameterDecorators.name: mAssetAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of mAsset tokens requested to be redeemed. eg mUSD.

returnDecorators.name: mAssetsActual
returnDecorators.description: The actual amount of mAsset tokens that were received from the redeem. eg mUSD.

functionDecorators.name: supplyTokenTo
functionDecorators.description: Deposits mAsset tokens to the savings contract.

parameterDecorators.name: mAssetAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of mAsset tokens to be deposited. eg mUSD.
